name: 100th Anniversary of the Swedish Iron Institute
obverse: Bust of King Oscar I facing left.
obverse_inscriptions: OSCAR SVER. NORR. GÖTH. O. VEND. KONUNG.
reverse: Vulcan working on an anvil. A spade, plough-share, shield, and sword rest against the anvil.
reverse_inscriptions: ÄN SKÄNKA BERGEN JERN TILL ODLING OCH FÖRSVAR.
TILL MINNE AF JERN KONTORETS HUNDRA ÅRS HÖGTID AF SV. BRUKS SOCIET. 1847.
description: This medal was made to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the Swedish Iron Institute.
